name: Toxic
note: All Pok√©mon who can learn TMs can learn Toxic except Unown, Wobbuffet, Wynaut, Kricketot, Burmy, Tynamo, and Spewpa.
summary: Badly poisons the target. As opposed to regular Poison status, this residual damage increases by 1/16 each turn the opponent is in. Toxic has infinite accuracy if the Pokemon is at least part Poison-type.
viability: Toxic is one of the most popular status moves in general. It's a boon for defensive walls like Sylveon, who make their living off Toxic-stalling opponents. This means that the opponent will have a hard time getting a kill, and are forced to either faint or switch out.
